name: Transition Stage
description:
Transition Stage is a short game about iteration.  Spiritual growth iterates through lifetimes as the soul develops with each set of problems. But the soul must show signs of change to continue on.  

Features
Short story
Mild puzzles
Pixel art
Slight role-playing

Credits

pixel-poem's 16-bit Dungeon asset pack
